/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, lined with a variety of buildings and trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is slightly distorted due to the perspective, adding a sense of depth and dimension to the view.
